text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The day of the tryouts is here, but I<n>can't stop thinking
about what T.M.<n>Opera O said. If only I could<n>understand
her reasoning.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Maybe I'll be able to find out at the<n>race.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Aha... Your desire to see me won out<n>at last.
choice_data_list: I was thinking I'd like to get to know you better.
I was thinking I'd like to get to know you better.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Heh, then I'd be overjoyed to show<n>you! Watch my race
and be amazed!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Ah, but look now. My rivals have<n>ventured forth in the midst
of our<n>conversation.

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Hey, Oppy! I'm super excited to race<n>today! ♪

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: I, uh... I w-won't do well, but... I'll try<n>really hard!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Hahaha! What fine spirits you're both<n>in! I look forward to a
magnificently<n>fierce bout between us!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And with that, the fateful tryouts<n>begin!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: This glory... shall be mine!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's such a close race that anyone<n>could seize it. As the
finish draws<n>near, T.M. Opera O pulls ahead, and...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Huff... Puff... Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Barely, just barely, she takes first.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Phew... So close, but... I couldn't make<n>it...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huff... Wheeze... You two wereso fast!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And yet, despite the win, Opera O<n>looks so... sullen.
choice_data_list: Hey, good race. That was an impressive finish.
Hey, good race. That was an impressive finish.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Impressive... To you, perhaps. But not<n>I...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Uh...

text_block_list.name: Haru Urara
text_block_list.text: Huh? Hey, what's the matter with<n>Oppy?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text: Well, uh, maybe she didn't win the<n>way she wanted to?

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
Um... This is just my own thought,<n>and the truth might be a
little different...<n>No, I'm sure I'm totally off...

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
But Opera O... She sets really high<n>bars all the time. I learn a
lot from her.

text_block_list.name: Meisho Doto
text_block_list.text:
She's always saying, "My dignity as<n>Overlord is at stake!"
Her heart's<n>really in it, you know? So winning by<n>a tiny
lead isn't quite, um...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Her "dignity as Overlord..." I think I get<n>why she looked so<n>
uncharacteristically sad.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She doesn't just want to win races.<n>She wants to stand tall,
true to her<n>name.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Unable to shake my concern, I chase<n>after Opera O, and
when I catch up, the<n>sky's overcast with dark clouds.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ah, you found me...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Tell me, do you prefer a sunny sky or<n>a cloudy one?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I favor one filled with sunlight. The<n>shine of the radiant sun
fills people<n>with bravery, you see.
choice_data_list: Uh, what are we talking about?
Uh, what are we talking about?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I'm telling you about my dreams. Ah,<n>but to tell the whole
story, we must<n>travel into the past...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
When I was a young child, I once<n>became lost in a gigantic
forest.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
In the middle of those dark woods, I<n>had not an inkling of
my<n>whereabouts... I'll always remember<n>feeling as if I
was the last person in<n>the world.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: But then... Oh, I was bestowed with agreat blessing! For that was the placewhere I met her...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: The Umamusume who would change<n>my destiny!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Indeed... In the deepest depths of that<n>surreal forest, I found
her in a spring<n>of sweet water.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
She smiled up at me from the water's<n>crystal clear surface
and told me that<n>all would work out in the end.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
She had the mightiest presence in the<n>world... The most
beautiful... I was<n>moved to my very soul!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
To think that such a resplendent being<n>had existed in this
wide world!
choice_data_list: Wait, when you say you found her in the spring...
Wait, when you say you found her in the spring...

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Yes, you understand now! The<n>Umamusume gazing up at
me from the<n>water was my very own reflection!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I was stunned as if struck by the<n>lightning of epiphany!
Before that, I<n>was ignorant of my own<n>hope-inspiring
brilliance!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
If I were to truly become a lord<n>absolute... how astoundingly
bright the<n>light of the Centurial Overlord would<n>be!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
I would become nothing less than the<n>sun, which bathes the
whole world in<n>its warmth!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: I must become that! I must be thesun of Umamusume that bringsprosperity to all!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I'm more confused than ever...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
But I see at least that she's serious<n>about taking on the title
of Overlord.

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: What's this?

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text: Ah, behold! The heavens have<n>opened!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
The light that shines forth... That is the<n>supreme radiance I
will achieve!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
Heh, now is not the time to mope<n>about. The Overlord must
train for her<n>next victory!

text_block_list.name: T.M. Opera O
text_block_list.text:
O sun! Praise be to you for showing<n>me the light! Hahaha!
Haaah ha ha ha<n>ha!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
While T.M. Opera O is preoccupied<n>with the sun on high, all I
see is the<n>twinkling light of hope in her eyes.
